Sentence: While waiting for the board to make a decision, Prejean meets Lloyd LeBlanc, the father of one of the murdered teenagers
LeBlanc reprimands Prejean for not speaking to the victims' families as well as to the killers
Patrick apologizes to Lloyd LeBlanc for his (Patrick) crime and tells Prejean he (Patrick) loves her (Prejean)
Prejean closes with a description of a prayer vigil she (Prejean) attends with Lloyd LeBlanc, the father of one of the murdered teenagers in the Sonnier case
